snippet: In this nonfiction book, the Irish novelist Colm Toibin looks at the lives and works of authors through the writing of others and through his own analysis.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book New Ways to Kill Your Mother: Writers and Their Families by Colm Toibin.
lead_paragraph: In this nonfiction book, the Irish novelist Colm Toibin looks at the lives and works of authors through the writing of others and through his own analysis.

headline.seo: Colm Toibin’s ‘New Ways to Kill Your Mother’ Looks at Writers
headline.main: Not a Title That’s Meant for Mom
headline.print_headline: Not a Title That’s Meant For Mom
